content.html: For current friends and acquaintances, please keep performance and delivery up. Relationship reductions may be required in the future, guided by the Friendship Stack Ranking system, as laid out in the handbook you should've received during Relationship Onboarding.
content.value:
For current friends and acquaintances, please keep performance and delivery up.

Relationship reductions may be required in the future, guided by the Friendship Stack Ranking system, as laid out in the handbook you should've received during Relationship Onboarding.
